byline.contributor: Paulina Villegas contributed reporting from New York.

lead_paragraph: An attacker was sought after opening fire during an international electronic music festival in Playa Del Carmen, and tourists were among the dead, officials said.
snippet: An attacker was sought after opening fire during an international electronic music festival in Playa Del Carmen, and tourists were among the dead, officials said....

headline.main: 5 Killed at BPM Festival in Mexico
